rbadia.voidspace.model
Class Asteroid

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
          java.awt.Rectangle
              rbadia.voidspace.model.Asteroid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Asteroid
extends java.awt.Rectangle

Represents every asteroid that fall in the screen. Includes small, medium, and large size asteroids. Also, includes a indestructible metal that we call diamond.

Author:
Daniel Santiago & Nataira Pag‡n
See Also:
Serialized Form

Asteroid

public Asteroid(GameScreen screen,
                int asteroidWidth,
                int asteroidHeight,
                int speed,
                int healthPoints,
                int magnitud)
Creates a new asteroid at a random x location at the top of the screen.

Parameters:
screen - the game screen
asteroidWidth - asteroid width
asteroidHeight - asteroid height
speed - asteroid speed
healthPoints - life of the asteroid
magnitud - the magnitud of the asteroid
